Isabella is Katherine's ancestor. Katherine is Natalie's ancestor, so Isabella is also an ancestor of Natalie. Frank is Natalie's descendant, so Natalie is Frank's ancestor, making Isabella an ancestor of Frank. Frank is Amber's ancestor, so Amber is Frank's descendant, making Isabella an ancestor of Amber. Barbara is Amber's descendant, so Amber is Barbara's ancestor, making Isabella an ancestor of Barbara. Barbara is Kelly's ancestor, Kelly is Patricia's ancestor, Patricia is Gerald's ancestor, Gerald is Roy's ancestor, Roy is Rachel's ancestor, Rachel is Judy's ancestor, Judy is Pamela's ancestor, Pamela is Roger's ancestor, Roger is Christian's ancestor, Christian is Heather's ancestor, Heather is Danielle's ancestor, Danielle is Brandon's ancestor, and Brandon is Edward's ancestor (since Edward is Brandon's descendant). Thus, Isabella is an ancestor of Edward.

Edward is Mason's ancestor, so Mason is Edward's descendant. Mason is Madison's ancestor, Bruce is Madison's descendant, Jose is Bruce's ancestor (since Bruce is Jose's descendant), Russell is Jose's descendant (since Jose is Russell's ancestor), Megan is Russell's descendant (since Megan is Russell's descendant), Andrea is Megan's descendant (since Megan is Andrea's ancestor), Jacob is Andrea's descendant, Diana is Jacob's descendant (since Diana is Jacob's descendant), Alice is Diana's ancestor (since Diana is Alice's descendant), Doris is Alice's descendant (since Doris is Alice's descendant), Robert is Doris's descendant, Dennis is Robert's descendant, Abigail is Dennis's descendant, Harold is Abigail's descendant (since Abigail is Harold's ancestor), Kyle is Kevin's descendant, Kevin is Harold's ancestor, so Harold is Kyle's ancestor, Kyle is Melissa's ancestor, Melissa is Keith's ancestor, Keith is Jonathan's ancestor, Sarah is Jonathan's descendant, so Jonathan is Sarah's ancestor, Maria is Ronald's descendant, Ronald is Sarah's ancestor, so Sarah is Maria's ancestor, Beverly is Maria's descendant, so Maria is Beverly's ancestor, Diane is Beverly's descendant, so Beverly is Diane's ancestor. Diane is Wayne's ancestor, Wayne is Bradley's descendant, so Wayne is Bradley's ancestor, Deborah is Bradley's descendant, so Bradley is Deborah's ancestor, Deborah is Peter's ancestor, Karen is Peter's descendant, so Peter is Karen's ancestor, Karen is Emma's ancestor, Emma is Frances's ancestor, Frances is Daniel's ancestor, Daniel is Ralph's ancestor, Ralph is Jessica's ancestor, Shirley is Jessica's descendant, so Jessica is Shirley's ancestor, Lisa is Shirley's descendant, so Shirley is Lisa's ancestor, Cheryl is Lisa's descendant, so Lisa is Cheryl's ancestor, Janice is Cheryl's descendant, so Cheryl is Janice's ancestor, James is Janice's descendant, so Janice is James's ancestor, Nicole is James's descendant, so James is Nicole's ancestor, and Victoria is Nicole's descendant, so Nicole is Victoria's ancestor. Thus, Diane is an ancestor of Victoria.

Since Mason is an ancestor of Madison, and Madison is an ancestor of Bruce, Bruce is an ancestor of Jose, Jose is an ancestor of Russell, Russell is an ancestor of Megan, Megan is an ancestor of Andrea, Andrea is an ancestor of Jacob, Jacob is an ancestor of Diana, Diana is an ancestor of Alice, Alice is an ancestor of Doris, Doris is an ancestor of Robert, Robert is an ancestor of Dennis, Dennis is an ancestor of Abigail, Abigail is an ancestor of Harold, Harold is an ancestor of Kyle, Kyle is an ancestor of Melissa, Melissa is an ancestor of Keith, Keith is an ancestor of Sarah, Sarah is an ancestor of Maria, Maria is an ancestor of Beverly, and Beverly is an ancestor of Diane, who is an ancestor of Victoria, Mason is an ancestor of Victoria.

Edward is an ancestor of Mason, and Edward is a descendant of Isabella, so Isabella is an ancestor of Edward, Edward is an ancestor of Mason, and Mason is an ancestor of Victoria. Therefore, Isabella is an ancestor of Victoria, meaning Victoria is Isabella's descendant.

The correct option is 2. Victoria is Isabella's descendant.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
